rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with a Vastu-compliant entrance, ensuring positive energy. It includes a small seating area and display shelf.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with ample natural light from the east-facing window to invite positivity as per Vastu. Contains comfortable seating arrangement and a television unit.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, this dining area features an open layout that encourages family interaction while adhering to Vastu principles by placing it in the south-east direction.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace with a north-west orientation to promote concentration and creativity, as per Vastu. Equipped with essential office furniture and storage space for documents.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen placed in the south-east quadrant following Vastu guidelines for health and prosperity, ensuring smooth workflow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom with a north-facing window to provide fresh air and natural light. It includes built-in storage for convenience.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned in the auspicious direction as per Vastu, ensuring positive energy flow.
East-facing window providing ample sunlight and enhancing room brightness.
South-east facing window to balance thermal comfort and natural light.
